NK015(ba)002:0: bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs 'chi med mchog ster zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)002:2: gang zhig khyod mtshan thos dang dran pas kyang /
NK015(ba)002:4: / 'chi med dngos grub kun stsol bcom ldan 'das //
NK015(ba)002:5: bla ma mchog dang dbyer med der btud nas /
NK015(ba)002:7: / 'chi med sgrub pa'i cho ga mdo tsam bshad /
NK015(ba)002:9: / 'dir bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud la
NK015(ba)002:10: brten pa'i tshe sgrub pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen
NK015(ba)002:11: po sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lugs bzhin sgrub pa la
NK015(ba)002:12: gnyis te / dgos pa gang la bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)002:13: ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga bshad pa'o //
NK015(ba)002:15: tshe nyams par byed pa'i rkyen /
NK015(ba)002:17: nyams pa gso ba'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa'o //
NK015(ba)002:20: dam nyams sems dkrugs yi chad dngangs pa dang //
NK015(ba)002:21: zhe sdang drag pos rbod gtong tshar bcad dang //
NK015(ba)002:22: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa dang //
NK015(ba)002:23: gnas ngan dag tu gnas phab 'di dag ni //
NK015(ba)002:24: tshe nyams dbugs dngangs bgegs kyi dbang du gyur //
NK015(ba)002:27: 'khor la khro zhing sdug skad 'byin pa dang //
NK015(ba)002:28: bzhin 'gyur spyod lam rnams ni 'chal ba dang //
NK015(ba)002:29: slob dpon 'tsho byed dus las yol ba dang //
NK015(ba)002:30: kha zas rnams kyang yi gar mi 'ong ba /
NK015(ba)002:32: / 'di dag rnams ni nyams pa'i rtags yin no //
NK015(ba)002:35: ting 'dzin phra mo las su rung ba dang //
NK015(ba)002:36: rgyud kyi don la mkhas shing dbang thob pa //
NK015(ba)002:37: mthu byin che zhing dam can nye ba gsum /
NK015(ba)002:39: / 'di gsum gang gis bkug kyang khug par 'gyur //
NK015(ba)002:40: zhes pas mtshan nyid gsum po gang rung dang ldan pa'i slob dpon ni rten gyi gang zag go //
NK015(ba)002:41: de lta bus rang gzhan gyi tshe'i 'gal rkyen zhi zhing /
NK015(ba)002:42: tshe yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i ched du cho ga 'di la 'jug par bya'o //
NK015(ba)002:43: gnyis pa ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga bshad pa la /
NK015(ba)002:45: dkyil 'khor tshe bca' bkod pa dang //
NK015(ba)002:46: gzhal yas khang dang tshe bskyed dang //
NK015(ba)002:47: spyan drang dang ni bstim pa dang //
NK015(ba)002:48: tshe yi rang bzhin 'gugs pa'i thabs //
NK015(ba)002:49: tshe bcing bzlas brjod tshe blan dang //
NK015(ba)002:50: dbang bskur sdom dang sba bar bya //
NK015(ba)002:51: zhes gsungs pa ltar bsgrub pa la /
NK015(ba)002:54: rjes kyi bya ba dang gsum las /
NK015(ba)002:59: rten gyi dkyil 'khor 'du bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)002:62: bkra shis dus la 'jug par bya //
NK015(ba)002:63: zhes pa ltar zla ba yar gyi ngo'i gza' skar 'phrod sbyor bzang po la /
NK015(ba)002:64: gang du bya ba'i gnas der gzhi bgegs la gtor ma btang nas /
NK015(ba)002:65: dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi ba byung gis byug /
NK015(ba)002:66: dri bzang dang bdud rtsi lngas chas chag gdab //
NK015(ba)002:67: thig skud dri zhim po'i thig chal gyis spags pa gsar nas /
NK015(ba)002:68: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yab yum du
NK015(ba)002:69: gsal ba snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems
NK015(ba)002:70: thig skud dang ro gcig pa ye shes lnga'i ngo
NK015(ba)002:75: dang po shar nub kyi tshangs thig gdab pa nas
NK015(ba)002:76: bzung thig chen brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi mkha' la gdab
NK015(ba)002:77: cing / de bzhin du sa la'ang gdab bo //
NK015(ba)002:79: dz+ny+aa na tsakra s+au tra ma ti kra ma h'u /
NK015(ba)002:82: dkyil 'khor thig bzhi ling tshe dgu //
NK015(ba)002:84: sgo dang bcas pa bri bar bya //
NK015(ba)002:85: zhes pa bzhin gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi
NK015(ba)002:86: rta babs sogs sgyu 'phrul zhi ba dang mthun pa
NK015(ba)002:87: nyid las / lte ba zlum bskor re'u mig dgu
NK015(ba)002:88: pa mu khyud can gyi mthar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
NK015(ba)002:89: nyid las / kyis bskor zhing / bar khyams spangs pa ni khyad par ro //
NK015(ba)002:90: de nas tshon sna lnga mdog rigs sdebs pa so so'i gnas su /
NK015(ba)002:92: p+aam l+aam m+aam m+aum t+aam las 'od dpag med gtso
NK015(ba)002:93: bor gyur pa'i rigs lnga'i ngo bor gyur pa bdag
NK015(ba)002:95: byang chub kyi sems su zhu ba tshon rtsi rnams la thim par bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)002:96: sngar gyi sa bon bcu po dang /
NK015(ba)002:97: +aahsarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye h+aum h+aum /
NK015(ba)002:99: +aam zhes brjod pas rin po che'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul tshon 'bar bar bsam nas /
NK015(ba)002:100: dbus kyi gling dgu'i lte ba dmar po /
NK015(ba)002:101: phyogs bzhi mtshams thig gis phye ba'i re'u mig rnams shar dkar /
NK015(ba)002:105: gdung bzhi dang mu khyud sngon po la rdo rje dkar po'am ser po //
NK015(ba)002:107: gru chad la sogs pa lhag ma sgyu 'phrul zhi dkyil ltar ro //
NK015(ba)002:108: lha gnas rnams su sku'am sa bon /
NK015(ba)002:109: phyag mtshan rnams mdog mthun gyi thig le rnams ji ltar rigs pa 'god /
NK015(ba)002:110: thig tshon gyi las rdzogs nas ye shes pa rnams badz+ra muhs gshegs su gsol /
NK015(ba)002:111: de dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa rnying par rdul tshon sgrub pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
NK015(ba)002:112: gzhan du na ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor la brten pas kyang rung ngo //
NK015(ba)002:113: gnyis pa tshe'i rdzas bca' ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:115: dbus su shel gyi bum par ni //
NK015(ba)002:116: dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang //
NK015(ba)002:117: cong zhing dkar po rnam gsum dang //
NK015(ba)002:118: dkar dang mngar gsum 'chi med sman //
NK015(ba)002:119: byang chub sems sogs gzhag par bya //
NK015(ba)002:120: mu ge sel ba'i 'bru lnga dang /
NK015(ba)002:122: / 'du ba sel ba'i sman lnga dang //
NK015(ba)002:123: nor gyi dbyig ldan rin chen lnga //
NK015(ba)002:124: snying po lnga dang dri lnga bsham //
NK015(ba)002:125: tshe 'brang rgya gram rgyas btab nas //
NK015(ba)002:126: mda' dar bcas pa gzhag pa ni //
NK015(ba)002:127: lha yi grangs dang mnyam par bya //
NK015(ba)002:128: mchod pa mang pos yongs su bskor //
NK015(ba)002:129: zhes gsungs pa ltar shel sogs rin po che'i bum pa gtsang zhing dag par byas nas /
NK015(ba)002:131: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad /
NK015(ba)002:132: kha rgyan mgul chings sogs chas su bcug /
NK015(ba)002:133: sngar bshad pa'i bum rdzas rnams 'o ma dang dri
NK015(ba)002:134: bzang gi chu la sbyar ba'i bcud kyis bkang ba
NK015(ba)002:135: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su many+dzi la bzhag /
NK015(ba)002:136: de'i khar sman dang spod kyi bran pa'i tshe'i 'brang rgyas bum gzugs can ril bus bskor ba /
NK015(ba)002:137: kha rdo rje rgya gram gyis bkab cing nyi zla'i tog gis mtshan pa bkod /
NK015(ba)002:138: tshe mda' rgod sgro ma dar le brgan dang me long btags pa tshe 'brang la btsugs pa'am /
NK015(ba)002:139: mi bde na rgyab tu bkod /
NK015(ba)002:140: tshe ril dang tshe chang ni gong gi tshe ril dang bum bcud kyis chog mod /
NK015(ba)002:141: spro na g.yas g.yon du logs su bshams kyang rung /
NK015(ba)002:142: gang ltar yang dkyil 'khor gyi mthar zhabs bsil /
NK015(ba)002:147: gtor ma dang sman phud sogs mchod par 'os pa'i yo byad thams cad tshogs par byas nas /
NK015(ba)002:148: gral phyag dang tshul phyag sngon du 'gro bas rol mos byin dbab par bya'o //
NK015(ba)002:149: gnyis pa cho ga'i sngon 'gro la drug las /
NK015(ba)002:150: dang po rgyud sbyang ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:151: bla ma rig 'dzin tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil
NK015(ba)002:152: 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs
NK015(ba)002:154: bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK015(ba)002:155: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK015(ba)002:156: dus gsum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)002:157: mchog gsum bsten pa'i zhing gyur la //
NK015(ba)002:158: gnyis med yid kyi skyabs su mchi //
NK015(ba)002:159: dngos 'byor yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i //
NK015(ba)002:160: dag pa'i mchod pa zhes su gsol //
NK015(ba)002:161: dngos grub chu bo gcod pa'i gegs //
NK015(ba)002:162: nyes byas ma lus bshags par bgyi //
NK015(ba)002:163: phyogs bcu 'khor gsum dag pa'i chos //
NK015(ba)002:164: ma chags spyod la rjes yi rang //
NK015(ba)002:165: dag pa'i mtha' bzhi dri ma med //
NK015(ba)002:166: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do //
NK015(ba)002:167: bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' la //
NK015(ba)002:168: dag pa gsum gyi lus 'bul lo //
NK015(ba)002:169: tshe rabs bgrangs pa'i las rnams kun //
NK015(ba)002:170: bsdus te byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK015(ba)002:171: zhes rgyud dag par byas nas tshogs zhing rnams rang la bsdu /
NK015(ba)002:172: gnyis pa mtshams bcad pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:173: bdag nyid skad cig gis pad+ma he ru kar gyur par mos nas /
NK015(ba)002:176: gsang ba'i dam can so so nas /
NK015(ba)002:178: / 'du ba'i lha ni ma gtogs pa //
NK015(ba)002:179: thams cad thugs rjes bskangs zin gyis //
NK015(ba)002:180: da lta nyid du so sor dengs //
NK015(ba)002:182: rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)002:183: de ma thag tu bkas nas ni //
NK015(ba)002:184: bdun brgyud rigs kyang brlag par 'gyur //
NK015(ba)002:185: h+aum h+aum h+aum bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la man+da la phata phata phata /
NK015(ba)002:186: ha la ha la ha la h+aum /
NK015(ba)002:187: zhes pas bgegs rnams ring du bskrad nas /
NK015(ba)002:188: khor yug thams cad rdo rje srung ba'i gur khang
NK015(ba)002:189: chen pos yongs su gtams pas cis kyang mi shig
NK015(ba)002:190: par bsam mo // gsum pa bshags pa bya ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:191: badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs bshags yul rnams mkha' khyab tu
NK015(ba)002:192: sad pa'i spyan sngar bshags sdom gyi bsam pa rtse
NK015(ba)002:194: ye shes sku mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni //
NK015(ba)002:195: zhes sogs brjod pas sdig sgrib thams cad ye nas
NK015(ba)002:196: rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings su dag par bsam mo
NK015(ba)002:197: // bzhi pa dam bca' ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:198: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rgya snying gar bcings te lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pos //
NK015(ba)002:199: rnal 'byor dbang po ye shes mthar phyin pa //
NK015(ba)002:203: bde bar gshegs pa khyed ci 'dra //
NK015(ba)002:205: lnga pa byin dbab pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:206: ye shes kyi 'khor lo thams cad mkha' khyab tu sad par byas te /
NK015(ba)002:207: h+aum a la la hoh b+ha ga w+aan sa ma hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK015(ba)002:208: 'phags mchog thugs rje'i dus la bab //
NK015(ba)002:209: khyad par bstan pa'i dus la bab //
NK015(ba)002:210: mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab //
NK015(ba)002:211: byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab //
NK015(ba)002:212: dbang mchog skur ba'i dngos grub stsol ba'i mthu chen bdud 'dul bcom ldan 'das //
NK015(ba)002:213: byin chen byin phob dbang chen bskur dngos grub mchog stsol bdag cag las 'bras mchis par mdzod //
NK015(ba)002:214: spos sreg cing rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra sbyar te /
NK015(ba)002:215: h+aum h+aum h+aum h+aum zhes byin bsdus pas mkha' khyab
NK015(ba)002:216: kyi lha tshogs thams cad bdag gnas yo byad rnams
NK015(ba)002:217: la thim ste sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan
NK015(ba)002:218: gyi 'khor lor byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)002:219: drug pa mchod rdzas byin gyis rlob pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:220: rdzas rnams ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ais bsang /
NK015(ba)002:221: rang gi thugs ka nas ram yam kham 'phros pas
NK015(ba)002:222: mchod rdzas kyi dngos 'dzin nyes skyon thams cad bsregs
NK015(ba)002:223: gtor sbyangs te stong par gyur /
NK015(ba)002:224: stong pa'i ngang las slar yang thugs ka nas /
NK015(ba)002:226: na mah sa man+ta bud+d+ha n+aam ga ga na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa ha /
NK015(ba)002:227: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa gad+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK015(ba)002:230: zhes brjod pas mchod pa'i lha mo kun tu bzang
NK015(ba)002:231: po'i mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byams spro bas nam mkha'i
NK015(ba)002:232: khams thams cad khyab par gyur /
NK015(ba)002:234: bdud rtsi'i snod b+hany+dza 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang gi
NK015(ba)002:235: nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la dpa' bo
NK015(ba)002:237: de las 'od zer 'phros 'khor 'das kyis bdud rtsi
NK015(ba)002:238: thams cad bsdus nas thim pa zhu zhing 'dres pa
NK015(ba)002:239: las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por
NK015(ba)002:241: +aahh+aum sarba pan+tsa a mri ta h+aum h+r+aihth+aa /
NK015(ba)002:244: gtor gzhong b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i gzhal yas khang
NK015(ba)002:245: gi nang du gtor rdzas las 'dod yon gyi phung
NK015(ba)002:246: po cir yang 'char ba'i longs spyod kyi gter du
NK015(ba)002:248: ba lim ta te dz+wa ba lim ta ba la ba t+ya gu h+ya sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)002:250: de dag ni sngon 'gro'i bya ba'o //
NK015(ba)002:252: ting 'dzin gsum gyis khog dbub pa /
NK015(ba)002:253: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa /
NK015(ba)002:254: las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin spro ba /
NK015(ba)002:255: khyad par tshe'i phrin las sgrub pa dang bzhi /
NK015(ba)002:257: dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa //
NK015(ba)002:258: rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das //
NK015(ba)002:259: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
NK015(ba)002:260: de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o /
NK015(ba)002:262: / 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad mi dmigs shing
NK015(ba)002:263: spros pa dang bral ba stong pa nyid du bsgom
NK015(ba)002:264: pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
NK015(ba)002:265: de bzhin ni spros med kyang //
NK015(ba)002:266: rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i dbyings //
NK015(ba)002:267: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
NK015(ba)002:268: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
NK015(ba)002:269: de bzhin nyid ma rtogs pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK015(ba)002:270: sems can rnams la 'dzin med sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK015(ba)002:271: snying rje chen po mkha' khyab tu bsgom pa ni
NK015(ba)002:272: kun snang ngo // dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin //
NK015(ba)002:274: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK015(ba)002:275: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
NK015(ba)002:276: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK015(ba)002:277: yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin //
NK015(ba)002:278: yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya //
NK015(ba)002:279: rang rig snang stong gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin
NK015(ba)002:280: a yig dmar po'i rnam par bsgom pa ni rgyu'i
NK015(ba)002:283: sems nyid a dmar po dri ma med par gsal ba las /
NK015(ba)002:284: e yam wam lam sum ram rnams chad /
NK015(ba)002:288: e las nam mkha' chos kyi 'byung gnas 'byams klas pa'i dbyings su /
NK015(ba)002:289: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ljang gu g.yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
NK015(ba)002:290: wam las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po /
NK015(ba)002:291: lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi /
NK015(ba)002:292: sum las rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri rab zur bzhi pa /
NK015(ba)002:293: ram las me'i khor yug nam mkha'i mtha' klas par 'bar ba'o //
NK015(ba)002:297: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he badz+ra dz+ny+aa na tsakra man+da la b+h+r+aum /
NK015(ba)002:298: b+h+r+aum yig yongs su gyur pa las /
NK015(ba)002:299: ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa /
NK015(ba)002:300: nang nas rim pa bzhin dmar dkar ser sngo ljang
NK015(ba)002:301: ba'i rtsig pa rim pa lnga dang ldan pa'i steng
NK015(ba)002:302: na rin po che'i pha gu ser po rin po
NK015(ba)002:303: che sna tshogs pas bkra ba 'phyar thabs su bkod
NK015(ba)002:304: pa'i mthar mu tig gi mgul 'khor 'phyang ba /
NK015(ba)002:305: de'i steng du bre phul gyi snam bu la gser
NK015(ba)002:306: gyi ske rags bzhi'i phyi ngos su ma ka ra'i
NK015(ba)002:307: kha nas rin po che'i d+r+wa ba dang d+r+wa ba
NK015(ba)002:308: phyed pa dar dang rnga yab /
NK015(ba)002:310: zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa la sogs pas mdzes pa /
NK015(ba)002:311: de'i phyi ngos su bya 'dab las 'phyang ba'i rin po che'i shar bu /
NK015(ba)002:312: steng ngos su mda' yab pad+ma 'dab ma phyed pa'i dbyibs can /
NK015(ba)002:313: de dag gi bar bar du bum pa la gnas pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
NK015(ba)002:315: zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i gdugs kyis brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)002:316: rtsig pa'i 'gram nas 'dod yon gyi snam bu dmar
NK015(ba)002:317: pos bskor ba la gzugs rdo rje ma sogs lha
NK015(ba)002:318: mo rnams kyis mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byams spro ba
NK015(ba)002:319: / sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams dang /
NK015(ba)002:320: zur bzhir zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje nor bus brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)002:321: sgo khang them skas dang bcas pa'i sgo logs kyi
NK015(ba)002:322: zur bzhi nas bum pa la gnas pa'i ka ba
NK015(ba)002:323: bzhi bzhis bteg pa'i rta babs snam bu brgyad pa
NK015(ba)002:324: / bsil khang dang ldan pa'i rtse mor pad+ma la
NK015(ba)002:325: gnas pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs kyis phub pa
NK015(ba)002:326: g.yas g.yon du ri dwags pho mo dang bcas pa
NK015(ba)002:327: / / gzhan yang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs pa dang /
NK015(ba)002:328: gser gyi dril bu la sogs pas brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)002:329: sgo'i g.yas g.yon gyi gzhi la t+aa la'i ljon pa dang /
NK015(ba)002:330: dpag bsam gyi shiing la bkra shis pa'i bya snyan par sgrog pa sna tshogs gnas pa /
NK015(ba)002:331: shing de dag kyang gser gyi tha gus bres shing /
NK015(ba)002:332: dril bu dang g.yer kha chos kyi sgra snyan par 'khrol bas mdzes pa /
NK015(ba)002:333: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi rdzing bu la lha mo sna tshogs bde bar rtse ba /
NK015(ba)002:334: rin po che'i phung po 'od 'bar ba re re ste brgyad dang /
NK015(ba)002:335: gzhan yang rin po che sna bdud dang /
NK015(ba)002:336: bkra shis pa'i rdzas brgyad sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis mdzes par gang ba'o //
NK015(ba)002:337: gzhal yas khang gi lte ba re'u mig dgu pa
NK015(ba)002:338: pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa mu khyud dang bcas pas
NK015(ba)002:339: bskor ba'i phyogs bzhi nas rigs kyi mtshan ma can
NK015(ba)002:340: gyi ka ba brgyad kyis btegs pa'i rdo rje'i gdung
NK015(ba)002:341: zlum dang / gdung chen bzhis mig mang ris su
NK015(ba)002:342: bres pas mdzes par phub pa'i dbus phyur bur gyur
NK015(ba)002:343: pa'i rtse mo rigs kyi mtshan ma can gyi tog
NK015(ba)002:344: zlum dang / gis mdzes pa / steng 'og thams cad shar dkar /
NK015(ba)002:348: dbus dmar ba dwangs shing sgrib pa med par kun tu gsal ba /
NK015(ba)002:349: sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze'u 'brur tshad med pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la rdzogs pa /
NK015(ba)002:350: phyi nas rdo rje srung ba'i gur khang 'bar ba
NK015(ba)002:351: me'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro bas yongs su bskor
NK015(ba)002:352: ba'o // gtso bo'i gnas su rma bya brgyad kyis
NK015(ba)002:353: btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri pad nyi zla ba
NK015(ba)002:354: ba'o // ste lnga brtsegs / phyogs mtshams kyi re'u mig dang /
NK015(ba)002:356: sgo bzhi rnams su pad+ma dang nyi gdan re re /
NK015(ba)002:357: rang gi sems nyid a dmar po gdan dbus ma'i steng du babs /
NK015(ba)002:361: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa bsal /
NK015(ba)002:363: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK015(ba)002:365: rang nyid bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye
NK015(ba)002:366: shes dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po pad+ma
NK015(ba)002:367: r+aa ga'i lhun po la nyi ma shar ba ltar
NK015(ba)002:370: zhi zhing rab tu 'dzum pa'i mdangs gsal ba'i zhal
NK015(ba)002:371: gyi 'gyur ba ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol
NK015(ba)002:372: pa'i nyams can / mtshan dang dpe brgyad kyis 'bar ba /
NK015(ba)002:373: phyag g.yon mnyam gzhag gis 'chi med bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa dang /
NK015(ba)002:374: g.yas pas rdo rje rgya gram bum pa'i kha bkab pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:375: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis brtan par bzhugs pa'o //
NK015(ba)002:376: yab kyi thugs ka nas g.yon pa'i barla steng du p+aam r+aa ga ra ti /
NK015(ba)002:377: yum gos dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
NK015(ba)002:378: g.yas pas mda' dar le brgan g.yab cing /
NK015(ba)002:379: g.yon bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa /
NK015(ba)002:380: pad+ma'i skyil mo krung gis 'khril ba /
NK015(ba)002:381: gnyis ka'ang lha rdzas kyi dar dkar po gser gyi ngang ris can gyi stod g.yogs dang /
NK015(ba)002:383: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i cod pan /
NK015(ba)002:385: gar gyi phu dung ste dar gyi chas gos lnga dang /
NK015(ba)002:392: phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu ste rin po che'i rgyan brgyad kyis mdzes par spras pa /
NK015(ba)002:393: mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can /
NK015(ba)002:394: gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin ldan pa ste zhi ba'i nyams dgu rgyas pa /
NK015(ba)002:395: sangs rgyas kyi sprin phung mtha' yas par 'char ba'i
NK015(ba)002:396: 'od zer kha dog drug gi snang ba re re
NK015(ba)002:397: yang bye ba phrag drug drug tu 'phro zhing 'bar
NK015(ba)002:398: ba'i klong na bde stong gnyis su med pa'i ngo
NK015(ba)002:400: gtso bo'i thugs ka nas ling tshe brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir /
NK015(ba)002:403: l+aam m+aam m+aum t+aam rnams chad pa las /
NK015(ba)002:404: shar du spyan ma dkar mo /
NK015(ba)002:405: lhor m+aa ma k+ai ser mo /
NK015(ba)002:406: nub tu dbyings phyug ma sngon mo /
NK015(ba)002:407: byang du sgrol ma ljang gu /
NK015(ba)002:408: bzhi ka'ang g.yas tshe'i bum pa dang /
NK015(ba)002:410: mer rgyas 'debs ma dkar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pa /
NK015(ba)002:411: bden bral du tshe 'phel ma ser mo kha t+w+aam ka 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:412: rlung du rmongs byed ma dmar mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:413: dbang ldan du za byed ma ljang gu rdor dril 'dzin pa'o //
NK015(ba)002:414: slar yang thugs ka nas pad 'dab brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir h'u t+r+aam h+r+aiha dang /
NK015(ba)002:415: mtshams bzhir d+h+au pu a gan rnams chad pa las /
NK015(ba)002:416: shar du l+aa s+ye ma dkar mo me long 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:417: lhor m+aa l+ye ma ser mo 'phreng ba 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:418: nub tu girti ma dmar mo pi wam brdung ba /
NK015(ba)002:419: byang du n+airti ma ljang gu rnga yab 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:420: mer bdug spos ma dkar ser spos khang 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:421: bden bral du me tog ma dmar ser me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:422: rlung du mar me ma dmar ljang mar me 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:423: dbang ldan du dri chab ma dkar ljang dri'i dung phor 'dzin pa'o //
NK015(ba)002:424: slar yang thugs ka nas sgo bzhir dzahmh'u bam hohchada pa las /
NK015(ba)002:425: shar sgor lcags kyu ma dkar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:426: lhor sgor zhags pa ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:427: nub sgor lcags sgrog ma dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:428: byang sgor dril bu ma ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)002:429: de thams cad kyang lha'i na chung lang tsho gsar pa'i nyams can dar gyi na bza' dang /
NK015(ba)002:430: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
NK015(ba)002:431: skyil krung phyed pa'i stabs kyis rol ba'o //
NK015(ba)002:432: de nas dbang bskur ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:433: spyi bo'i gnas lngar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rjes
NK015(ba)002:434: chags kyi mes zhu ba'i ye shes lnga'i chu rgyun
NK015(ba)002:435: gyis dbang bskur bar bsam la /
NK015(ba)002:436: 'od dpag med dang por byas pa'i so so'i dbang rgya spyi bo'i gnas lngar 'jog cing /
NK015(ba)002:437: ma h+aa pra t+y+aa bek+sha na dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK015(ba)002:438: de bzhin du pra t+ya bek+sha na'i tshab tu /
NK015(ba)002:442: krit+y+aa nush+th+aa na rnams bcug pa brjod cing /
NK015(ba)002:443: zhes dbang bskur bas nyon mongs pa lnga'i dri ma sbyangs /
NK015(ba)002:444: phur po lnga sangs rgyas lngar gnas bsgyur /
NK015(ba)002:445: chu'i lhag ma spyi bor brtan pa yongs su gyur
NK015(ba)002:446: pa las 'od dpag med bdag por gyur pa'i de
NK015(ba)002:447: bzhin gshegs pa rigs lngas dbu brgyan par gyur /
NK015(ba)002:449: rang gi spyi mgrin snying gar zla ba pad+ma nyi ma la gnas pa'i +aahh+aum /
NK015(ba)002:450: de'i 'od zer gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rgyud bskul /
NK015(ba)002:451: rdo rje gsum gyi lha tshogs nam mkha' gang bar byon nas /
NK015(ba)002:453: yongs su gyur pa las rnam snang /
NK015(ba)002:455: mi bskyod pa dang bcas pas rgyas btab par bsam la /
NK015(ba)002:456: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya gnas gsum du 'cha' zhing /
NK015(ba)002:457: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK015(ba)002:458: de bzhin du k+aa ya'i tshab tu w+aa ka dang /
NK015(ba)002:459: tsit+ta zhes barjesa nas brjod cing rdo rje gsum du nga rgyal bya'o //
NK015(ba)002:460: gsum pa las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la /
NK015(ba)002:461: ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ba dang /
NK015(ba)002:464: rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros
NK015(ba)002:465: pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo mdun gyi nam mkhar
NK015(ba)002:467: ga go na'i phyag rgya dpung par bcings te /
NK015(ba)002:469: yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
NK015(ba)002:470: nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
NK015(ba)002:471: ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong //
NK015(ba)002:472: mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs //
NK015(ba)002:473: e h+ye hi b+ha ga w+aan ma h+aa k+aa ru ni ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK015(ba)002:474: zhes pas dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang nye bar spyan drangs te //
NK015(ba)002:475: thugs rje'i lcags kyus thugs dam rgyud bskul zhing //
NK015(ba)002:476: byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan yang 'dren //
NK015(ba)002:477: lcags sgrog bka' yi pho nyas gnas bskyod la //
NK015(ba)002:478: bde gshegs bzhugs shing rnam grol dgyes pa bskyed //
NK015(ba)002:479: badz+ra ang+ku sha dzahs ye shes pa'i lha tshogs dam tshig pa'i spyi bor dgug /
NK015(ba)002:481: rang rang gi thugs kar gzhug /
NK015(ba)002:484: badz+ra g+han+de hoh dgyes pa bskyed de 'gro don ma
NK015(ba)002:485: rdzogs kyi bar du brtan par bzhugs par bsam mo
NK015(ba)002:488: nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcas la /
NK015(ba)002:490: bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
NK015(ba)002:491: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyis //
NK015(ba)002:492: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun //
NK015(ba)002:493: kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol //
NK015(ba)002:494: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo bi shwa mu
NK015(ba)002:495: khe b+h+yahsarba tat+kham ut+ga te s+pha ra na i mam
NK015(ba)002:496: ga ga na kham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)002:498: yang dag don du dag mod kyang /
NK015(ba)002:500: / 'gro ba yongs kyi don slad du //
NK015(ba)002:501: phyag dang zhabs ni bsil nas kyang //
NK015(ba)002:502: rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
NK015(ba)002:503: +aa ha ra +aa ha ra sarba bid+ya d+ha ra
NK015(ba)002:504: p+au dzi te na mahs man+ta bud+d+ha nam ga ga
NK015(ba)002:505: na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)002:507: so so'i phyag rgya bcas te /
NK015(ba)002:509: spos kyis sprin lding bdug pa ma //
NK015(ba)002:511: byams pa thabs dang shes rab las //
NK015(ba)002:512: badz+ra d+hu pe'i mchod par rol //
NK015(ba)002:513: pa na pem pe nu su ra to /
NK015(ba)002:515: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sid+d+hi hu /
NK015(ba)002:517: sarba ma h+aa su kha sid+d+hi hu /
NK015(ba)002:518: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK015(ba)002:521: snying rje thabs badz+ra pu sh+pe'i pa na sogs push+pe pu /
NK015(ba)002:522: dbang gi phyag rgya sgron ma bsnams //
NK015(ba)002:524: dga' ba badz+r+aa lo ke'i +aa lo ke h+r+aih tsan+dana bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma //
NK015(ba)002:526: btang snyoms badz+ra gan+d+he'i gan+d+he gan /
NK015(ba)002:529: stong gsum b+hany+dza'i bzed khong du //
NK015(ba)002:530: srid gsum sems can dug chen la //
NK015(ba)002:531: dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsir sbyar bas //
NK015(ba)002:532: bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis rdzogs /
NK015(ba)002:534: / 'chi med bdud rtsi'i g.yung drung chu //
NK015(ba)002:535: ro yi khams rnams slong bar byed //
NK015(ba)002:536: dug gi phung po 'joms byed pa //
NK015(ba)002:537: rtsi mchog sman gyi mchod pa bzhes //
NK015(ba)002:538: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)002:539: zhes gu h+ya lag gi phyag rgyas gtor bas bdud
NK015(ba)002:540: rtsi'i sprin gyis lha rnams mnyes shing tshim par bsam
NK015(ba)002:541: mo // lnga pa gtor ma'i mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:543: zla rgyas la sogs snying po mchog /
NK015(ba)002:544: m+aam sa la sogs rnam lnga'i rdzas //
NK015(ba)002:545: me tog la sogs tsan+dana phreng //
NK015(ba)002:546: sna tshogs mchod pa 'byung gyur cig /
NK015(ba)002:547: i dam push+pe d+h+au pe ba lim ta pra t+aits+tsha hohkha ram kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)002:548: drug pa yid byung gi mchod pa ni //
NK015(ba)002:549: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK015(ba)002:550: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
NK015(ba)002:551: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //
NK015(ba)002:552: mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang //
NK015(ba)002:553: sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi //
NK015(ba)002:554: mdzes par bres shing spras pa dang //
NK015(ba)002:556: dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil //
NK015(ba)002:557: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
NK015(ba)002:558: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
NK015(ba)002:559: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
NK015(ba)002:560: bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs //
NK015(ba)002:561: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
NK015(ba)002:562: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang //
NK015(ba)002:563: rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi //
NK015(ba)002:564: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis //
NK015(ba)002:565: bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis //
NK015(ba)002:566: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
NK015(ba)002:567: dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul //
NK015(ba)002:568: skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis //
NK015(ba)002:569: rim gyis yang na cig car du //
NK015(ba)002:570: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
NK015(ba)002:571: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom //
NK015(ba)002:573: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa p+au dza badz+ra s+w+aa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK015(ba)002:574: zhes rol mo sna tshogs kyis sgra sbyar bas kyang mchod do //
NK015(ba)002:577: bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje tshe dpag med //
NK015(ba)002:578: sgrib pa'i d+r+wa ba ma lus sel ba'i sku //
NK015(ba)002:579: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes sku mnga' ba //
NK015(ba)002:580: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)002:581: bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje tshe dpag med //
NK015(ba)002:582: gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i gsung //
NK015(ba)002:583: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gsung mnga' ba //
NK015(ba)002:584: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i gsung la bcom ldan mgon po
NK015(ba)002:585: rdo rje tshe thugs mchog rnam par dag pa'i thugs
NK015(ba)002:586: // mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba //
NK015(ba)002:587: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)002:588: zhes chos nyid kyi rang sgras bstod par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)002:589: bzhi pa tshe'i phrin las bsgrub pa la bdun las /
NK015(ba)002:590: dang po tshe'i rang bzhin bsgom pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:591: bdag gi thugs ka nas h+aum spros pas /
NK015(ba)002:592: yum gyi mkha' nang du rdo rje rgya gram steng 'og gnyis su gyur pa'i bar du /
NK015(ba)002:594: zhes brjod pas nyi zla kha sbyor gyi ga'u'i nang
NK015(ba)002:595: du tshe'i rang bzhin thig le dkar po n+ri yig
NK015(ba)002:597: thal mo rgyab sprad de bsnol ba phyir 'grol zhing /
NK015(ba)002:599: zhes brjod pas rang gi thugs ka nas pho nya
NK015(ba)002:600: mang po spros pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang
NK015(ba)002:601: / bde bar gshegs pa rnams la tshe'i dngos grub zhus /
NK015(ba)002:602: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' ste 'byung ba chen po lnga dang /
NK015(ba)002:603: sman shing me tog sogs phyi snod 'jig rten gyi rtsi dang bcud kyi snying po thams cad dang /
NK015(ba)002:604: lha dang drang srong rig 'dzin grub pa /
NK015(ba)002:605: dri za gshin rje klu dang gnod sbyin /
NK015(ba)002:607: rgyal blon 'bangs 'khor sogs nang bcud sems can thams cad kyi tshe dang bsod nams /
NK015(ba)002:608: dpal dang 'byor ba rnams kyi dwangs ma dang /
NK015(ba)002:609: don dam skye 'jig 'pho 'gyur med pa tshe'i rang
NK015(ba)002:610: bzhin sogs 'khor 'das snod bcud kyi chos bcu bzhi
NK015(ba)002:611: po thams cad 'od zer gyi rnam par bsdus /
NK015(ba)002:612: 'chi bdag gshin rje la sogs pas brkus shing phrog pa dang /
NK015(ba)002:613: yar ba dang 'thor ba thams cad kyang bkug nas
NK015(ba)002:614: mkha' nang gi tshe rten la thim par bsam zhing
NK015(ba)002:615: / pun+ye pun+ye ma h+aa pun+ye a pa ri mi
NK015(ba)002:616: ta a yur+dz+ny+aa na sarba ro pa tsit+te s+w+aa h+aa
NK015(ba)002:618: gnyis pa tshe dgug pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:619: sku gsung thugs kyi bstod pa sngar bzhin byas pas nga rgyal bzung la /
NK015(ba)002:620: ting nge 'dzin gsal bzhin pas tshe'i mda' 'dar g.yab cing sngags kyis 'go drangs te /
NK015(ba)002:622: nam mkha' dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas rnam par dag /
NK015(ba)002:623: rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas skye shi med //
NK015(ba)002:624: rin chen dbyings phyug ma ni dgos 'dod re ba skong //
NK015(ba)002:625: pad+ma dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas chags dang bral //
NK015(ba)002:626: las kyi dbyings phyug ma ni mngon spyod phrin las mdzad //
NK015(ba)002:627: dbyings phyug chen mo khyed rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)002:628: rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsol //
NK015(ba)002:629: pun+ye pun+ye ma h+aa ma h+aa pun+ye a pa ri mi t+aa sogs bazla'o //
NK015(ba)002:631: shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma //
NK015(ba)002:632: gsang ba'i lha mo rgyas 'debs ma //
NK015(ba)002:633: rigs kyi lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
NK015(ba)002:634: phyag rgya'i lha mo l+aa s+ye ma //
NK015(ba)002:635: mchod pa'i lha mo d+h+au pe ma /
NK015(ba)002:637: / 'gugs pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma //
NK015(ba)002:638: tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)002:639: shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe khug la //
NK015(ba)002:640: shar lho me lha'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig /
NK015(ba)002:641: rdo rje mi 'gyur tshe yi dngos grub stsol //
NK015(ba)002:643: lho yi phyogs nas gsang ba'i lha mo tshe 'phel ma //
NK015(ba)002:644: rigs kyi lha mo m+aa ma k+ai /
NK015(ba)002:645: phyag rgya'i lha mo m+aa l+ye ma //
NK015(ba)002:646: mchod pa'i lha mo push+pe ma /
NK015(ba)002:648: / 'ching pa'i lha mo zhags pa ma //
NK015(ba)002:649: tshe bdag chen mo lho phyogs gshin rje'i lho nub srin po'i rdo rje mi 'gyur h+aum /
NK015(ba)002:650: nub kyi phyogs na gsang ba'i lha mo rmongs byed ma //
NK015(ba)002:651: rigs kyi lha mo gos dkar mo //
NK015(ba)002:652: phyag rgya'i lha mo girti ma //
NK015(ba)002:653: mchod pa'i lha mo +aa lo ke /
NK015(ba)002:654: sdom pa'i lha mo lcags sgrog ma //
NK015(ba)002:655: tshe bdag nub phyogs klu dbang nub byang rlung lha'i rdo rje mi 'gyur h'u /
NK015(ba)002:656: byang gi phyogs nas gsang ba'i lha mo za byed ma //
NK015(ba)002:657: rigs kyi lha mo dam tshig sgrol //
NK015(ba)002:658: phyag rgya'i lha mo n+airti ma //
NK015(ba)002:659: mchod pa'i lha mo gan+d+he ma /
NK015(ba)002:661: / 'bebs pa'i lha mo dril bu ma //
NK015(ba)002:662: tshe bdag byang phyogs gnod byang shar dbang ldan rdo rje mi 'gyur zhes phrin las bskul lo //
NK015(ba)002:664: badz+ra s+pho ta bam zhes brjod pas /
NK015(ba)002:665: nyi zla'i ga'u'i steng 'og gi rgya gram gnyis kyi
NK015(ba)002:666: rtse mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phreng bas
NK015(ba)002:667: bcings te cis kyang mi shigs par gyur /
NK015(ba)002:668: de nyid rang gi snying gar drangs te gnas pa brtan zhing mi g.yo bar bsam mo //
NK015(ba)002:669: bzhi pa bzlas pa bya zhing tshe blan pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:670: rang nyid gtso bo las logs su phye ba'i thugs ka nas h+aum le brgan gnyis chad khong brgyud /
NK015(ba)002:671: sna bug gnyis nas thon pa'i 'od zer gzungs thag
NK015(ba)002:672: rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khong seng brgyud nas
NK015(ba)002:673: mchod pa'i tshul du spros pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha
NK015(ba)002:676: de rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas
NK015(ba)002:677: 'khor 'das snod bcud kyi tshe dang bsod nams dpal
NK015(ba)002:678: dang gzi mdangs la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad
NK015(ba)002:679: 'chi med ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i dwangs mar bsdus
NK015(ba)002:680: nas bum nang du bskyil bar bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)002:681: gzungs thag la 'jus nas bzlas pa ci nus su bya'o //
NK015(ba)002:682: lnga pa tshe bsdu ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:683: 'khor 'das kyi tshe bcud thams cad bum nang gi tshe rten la thim par bsam /
NK015(ba)002:684: de nas h+aum zhes brjod pas tshe rten kyang snying po lnga la thim /
NK015(ba)002:685: snying po lnga yang 'od kyi gong bur zhu ba las dkar po /
NK015(ba)002:689: h+aa ljang gu rnams su gyur par bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)002:690: a yur+dz+ny+aa na tshe yi mchog /
NK015(ba)002:691: tshe sa la nyams pa gser la bsdu //
NK015(ba)002:692: chu la nyams pa tsh+wa la bsdu //
NK015(ba)002:693: shing la nyams pa mngar la bsdu /
NK015(ba)002:695: / 'bru la nyams pa chang la bsdu //
NK015(ba)002:696: rtsi la nyams pa mar la bsdu //
NK015(ba)002:697: mi la nyams pa n+ri la bsdu /
NK015(ba)002:699: / 'bru lnga dang ni snying po lnga //
NK015(ba)002:700: gnas lnga dag tu byin brlabs nas //
NK015(ba)002:701: rnal 'byor tshe la bar chad med //
NK015(ba)002:702: ces pa'i don bsgom par bya'o //
NK015(ba)002:703: drug pa dbang nod pa ni /
NK015(ba)002:704: bum nang gi sa bon lnga po 'od zer dang
NK015(ba)002:705: bcas pa rang gi gnas lngar zhugs te tshe rten
NK015(ba)002:707: ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK015(ba)002:708: nam mkha' gsang ba gsum las byung //
NK015(ba)002:709: nam mkha'i rigs kyi dbang bskur bas //
NK015(ba)002:710: dbang bskur chen po dam pa sbyin //
NK015(ba)002:711: bud+d+ha k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa /
NK015(ba)002:712: ji snyed sangs rgyas rdo rje gsang rdo rje rigs
NK015(ba)002:713: kyi dbang bskur badz+ra k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa
NK015(ba)002:714: h+aum / ji snyed rin chen gsang rin chen rigs
NK015(ba)002:715: dbang bskur rat+na k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa s+w+aa
NK015(ba)002:716: h+aum / / ji snyed pad+ma gsang pad+ma rigs kyi
NK015(ba)002:717: dbang bskur pad+ma k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h+r+aih
NK015(ba)002:718: ji snyed las kyi gsang las kyi rigs kyi dbang
NK015(ba)002:719: h+aum / / bskur bas // dbang bskur chen po dam pa sbyin //
NK015(ba)002:720: karma k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa ha /
NK015(ba)002:721: de ltar dbang nod pa'i 'gal rkyen mi mthun pa'i
NK015(ba)002:722: phyogs thams cad zhi nas 'chi med tsho'i dngos grub
NK015(ba)002:724: slar yang rang nyid dkyil 'khor pa dang gnyis med du gyur par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)002:725: bdun pa tshe sba ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:726: tshe'i rang bzhin n+ri dang bcas pa 'od du zhu nas a yig 'bar bar gyur /
NK015(ba)002:727: a zhes brjod pas skye med spros bral zung 'jug
NK015(ba)002:728: bde ba chen po'i dbyings rtsol bral blo las 'das
NK015(ba)002:729: pa'i ngo bo nyid 'chi med gnyug ma'i rang bab
NK015(ba)002:731: mi 'gyur cis kyang mi shigs pa //
NK015(ba)002:732: stong pa'i go cha bla na med //
NK015(ba)002:733: mtshan ma'i spyod yul kun bcom nas //
NK015(ba)002:734: thams cad kun las rgyal bar gnas //
NK015(ba)002:735: ma byung mi gnas 'dus ma byas //
NK015(ba)002:736: chos kyi dbyings su tshe sbas pas //
NK015(ba)002:737: sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur //
NK015(ba)002:738: badz+ra k+aa w+aa tsi rak+sha h+aum /
NK015(ba)002:739: zhes pa'i don rkyen snang gi rtog pas ma bslad pa'i rang ngo bskyang ba la bslab bo //
NK015(ba)002:740: skabs 'dir slob ma rjes 'dzin gyi cho ga ni /
NK015(ba)002:741: gzhan du 'byung ba bzhin shes par bya'o //
NK015(ba)002:742: gsum pa rjes kyi cho ga ni /
NK015(ba)002:744: de nas gtor ma gtang bar bya //
NK015(ba)002:745: cho ga'i lhag chad kha bskang nas //
NK015(ba)002:746: spyod lam legs par gnas par bya'o //
NK015(ba)002:747: zhes pas dang po gtor ma gtong ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:748: tshogs mchod bya bar spro na rigs mthun gyi cho ga gzhan nas blang zhing /
NK015(ba)002:749: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtor ma rnams kyang so so'i cho ga bzhin du bsngo'o //
NK015(ba)002:750: gnyis pa chad lhag kha bskang ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:751: gtang rag gi mchod pa rnams bshams shing byin gyis brlab /
NK015(ba)002:752: rgyas bsdus ci rigs pas sngar bzhin mchod cing bstod /
NK015(ba)002:753: ma rnyed yongs su ma tshang dang /
NK015(ba)002:755: yi ge brgya pas nongs pa bzod par gsol zhing lhag chad kha bskang ngo //
NK015(ba)002:756: skabs 'dir nub tha ma dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga nyi tshe ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:757: 'khor 'das kyi tshe bcud thams cad tshe'i rdzas rnams la thim par bsam nas /
NK015(ba)002:759: tshe 'gugs kyis gzi byin bskyed de /
NK015(ba)002:760: las kyi rdo rjes tshe chang gi bum pa lag g.yas /
NK015(ba)002:761: tshe 'brang g.yon du bzung ba thabs shes kyi tshul du byas nas /
NK015(ba)002:762: tshe 'di rin chen gzhal yas khang //
NK015(ba)002:763: rdo rje rgya gram nyi zla'i tog /
NK015(ba)002:764: lha dang rdzas dang sngags kyi gtams /
NK015(ba)002:767: rdo rje slob dpon khyed la 'bul //
NK015(ba)002:768: tshe bdag chen po tshe bzhes shig /
NK015(ba)002:769: rdo rje slob dpon tshe bzhes shig /
NK015(ba)002:770: tshe yi dngos grub khyed la 'bul //
NK015(ba)002:771: zhes tshe 'brang gtad pa slob dpon gyi lag g.yas pas blang /
NK015(ba)002:772: de bzhin du tshe chang gi bum pa gtad la /
NK015(ba)002:774: nga ni lha mo gos dkar mo //
NK015(ba)002:775: bum pa rin chen gzhal yas khang //
NK015(ba)002:776: bum pa mi 'gyur tshe yis bkang //
NK015(ba)002:777: yi dam lha la tshe yang zhus //
NK015(ba)002:778: phyogs skyong lag nas tshe yang phrog /
NK015(ba)002:779: mi yi snying po tshe yang bsdus //
NK015(ba)002:780: rtsi bcud dang ni sman gyi bcud //
NK015(ba)002:781: phyogs bzhi dag nas bkug bkug nas //
NK015(ba)002:782: mtshams bzhi dag nas rab bsdus te /
NK015(ba)002:785: rdo rje slob dpon khyed la 'bul //
NK015(ba)002:786: tshe bdag chen po tshe rdo rje slob dpon tshe tshe yi dngos grub khyed la 'bul //
NK015(ba)002:787: zhes tshe chang gtad pa la g.yon pas blangs te rol la /
NK015(ba)002:788: 'dus pa gzhan rnams la yang tshe 'dzab bzla bzhin par tshe chang g.yas dang /
NK015(ba)002:789: tshe 'brang g.yon du bskor nas drangs pa rol zhing /
NK015(ba)002:790: gang du mdud pa der tshe mdud thebs pa zhes bya ste dge ba'i mtshan ma'o //
NK015(ba)002:791: gsum pa spyod lam bskyang ba ni /
NK015(ba)002:792: rdul tshon gyi nyin dang po rnams dang ras bris la brtan bzhugs dang /
NK015(ba)002:793: rdul tshon gyi nyin tha ma la //
NK015(ba)002:794: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
NK015(ba)002:795: ces sogs kyi mthar badz+ra muh zhes rang bzhin ye shes kyi 'khor lo chos kyi dbyings su gshegs /
NK015(ba)002:796: ting 'dzin dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsal ba las 'od zer 'phros /
NK015(ba)002:797: snod bcud thams cad sbyangs nas gzhal yas khang la thim /
NK015(ba)002:801: de thugs ka'i sa bon la /
NK015(ba)002:802: de gyen rdzogs n+aa da'i dbyings su thim par bsam la mnyam par bzhag /
NK015(ba)002:803: +aam +aa ro lika ces pas slar yang thun mtshams kyi lhar langs te /
NK015(ba)002:804: snang grags rigs gsum lha sngags chos nyid kyi rol
NK015(ba)002:805: par shes pas dge ba bsngo zhing shis pa brjod
NK015(ba)002:806: pas mtha' brgyan / rdul tshon yin na a k+aa
NK015(ba)002:807: ros bsdu ba sogs las kyi mtha' rgyas rnams spyi
NK015(ba)002:809: mchog tu ngo mtshar rmad byung ba'i //
NK015(ba)002:810: tshe dang ye shes sgrub pa'i thabs //
NK015(ba)002:811: rgyal ba'i bdag pos gang gsungs rgyud //
NK015(ba)002:812: grub mchog rnams kyis gsal ba bzhin //
NK015(ba)002:814: phan phyir nyung gsal go bde'i khrigs //
NK015(ba)002:815: brjod pa 'dis thob bsod nams kyis /
NK015(ba)002:818: ces bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las
NK015(ba)002:819: byung ba tshe dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs 'chi
NK015(ba)002:820: med mchog ster zhes bya ba 'di yang snyoms las
NK015(ba)002:821: pa 'gyur med rdo rjes nyi ma'i lo dbos nya
NK015(ba)002:822: ba'i tshes dge bar o rgyan smin grol gling du
NK015(ba)002:823: sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni mkhas btsun bzang po'i
NK015(ba)002:824: yon tan gyis mtho ba mkhan chen lo ts+aa ba
